## executeTask() function

Executes an asynchronous task

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function executeTask<T>(task: () => Promise<T>): TaskResult<T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  task | <code>() =&gt; Promise&lt;T&gt;</code> | the task to execute |

<b>Returns:</b>

`TaskResult<T>`
